description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

description.en:
The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger.  
  
"Lets be treasure hunters," said Cry Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest … but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent.  
  
But that was only the beginning of his adventure.  
  
"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."  
  
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."  
"Rest assured, Cry. We'll protect you!"  
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"  
  
Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures.  
  
Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter?

[Alt Official English](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/276659/)
description.ja:
「目指すはただひとつ　世界最強の英雄だ」

幼馴染みたちと共に最強の英雄になる誓いを立てたクライだったが、早々に才能がないことに気づく。――にもかかわらず、なぜか周りからの期待だけが跳ね上がっていく日々…。そしてクライの発言によって物事はいつもトンデモない方向へ――!?
description.pt:
A idade de ouro dos caçadores de tesouros que buscam riqueza, honra, poder e glória, e exploram tesouros ao redor do mundo sem levar em conta o perigo.   
"Vamos nos tornar um caçadores de tesouros", disse Cri Andrich, que fez um juramentocom seu um amigo de infância que iria se tornar o herói mais forte, mas não tinha talento.   
No entanto, a avaliação do entorno é de alguma forma alta por algum motivo, e apenas as expectativas estão saltando todos os dias.   
Toda vez que um amigo distante da raça humana entra em fúria, subir é uma habilidade de se sentar à terra! ”Uma   
fantasia cômica popular equivocada finalmente se torna realidade  
  
  
**Link :**  
- [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6093en/)
description.vi: Cùng làm thợ săn kho báu nào! Mục tiêu chỉ có một: Trở thành anh hùng mạnh nhất thế giới! Xưa kia, có 6 người đã thề hứa như vậy với nhau. Duy chỉ có một chàng trai trong số đó cực kì thiếu tài năng. Một ngày nọ, sau khi giãi bày những phiền muộn của mình với người bạn thuở nhỏ, cậu nhận được lời khuyên: "Krai này, không có vai gì hợp thì cậu làm leader đi". Tổ đội Strange Grief do những kẻ quái vật siêu tài năng (bạn thuở nhỏ) thành lập đã vang danh khắp đế quốc suốt vài năm nay. Và trước khi kịp hiểu được chuyện gì đang xảy ra, Krai đã được cất nhắc lên vị trí cao nhất, leader của tổ đội mạnh nhất. Bởi kì vọng tăng vọt của những người xung quanh, lời nói và hành động của cậu ta luôn bị hiểu nhầm, khiến cho tình hình chuyển biến theo hướng không ai ngờ tới... Đây là sử thi anh hùng đầy vinh quang và đau khổ của Krai Andrey trứ danh, clan master mạnh nhất của tổ đội mạnh nhất!

description.en: Since his childhood, Kiomaru has been formed by master Sadamitsu of the Gassan forge so that he could later become a specialist in sword making. One day, when he learns of the brutal death of a young man to which he sold his first sword, he realize his own inexperience and decides to adopt a new attitude by following an exacting training. After avenging the young man, he continues his training, but one day, his master reveal to him an unbelievable secret: 18 years ago, meteorites nicknamed "Steel of the stars" fell from the sky on a dark mountain. Since that day, it seems the wheel of destiny enforced itself.

Kakeru Kiritani is a boy who is not good at socializing, doesn't attend school, and spends most of his time playing video games. In his last year of highschool, a fateful encounter awaits him! The one who appears in front of Kakeru is the complete opposite of him. She's naive, has a lot of fans and haters, and causes a lot of problems, but even so she's a beautiful girl who catches everyone's attention—Rena Nanase!

Torn between love and dreams, where is their last year of highschool headed!?
The hit song "Goodbye Declaration," which has over 100 million views on YouTube, has been adapted into a novel, and now it's going to crazily bloom into a manga!

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

description.en:
2022, Japan's non-workers regeneration method has been established.  
Person who does not have income more than six months, is subject to a treatment where they rewrite their brain at a regeneration treatment facility.  
Tatsuya Kamijou was working in a foreign-owned investment company. One day he loses his job, but six months later, Tatsuya is sent to a concentration camp rather than a playback facility. There he is subjected to worse treatment than brainwashing and training.   
Why was Tatsuya sent there?

altTitles.ja: トキワ来たれり!!

description.en: Tokiwa Yasaka lives in an unusual time, and according to his dreams, it's about to become even stranger. He's been having a dream of a woman called Rein ever since the robot Deus Ex Machina III came to his home. He and Machina attend the same school, where their other classmates include a secret ninja (Kanata Kusanagi) and a sorcerer (Haruka Yata). When Tokiwa, the robot, the ninja, and the sorcerer rush to rescue the student council president from a demon, the boys find that they've all been having the same dream! What is going to happen to their world?

description.en:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
___
**Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f)
**Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)
description.ja:
学校では“空気モブ”な高校生・三森灯火は、クラスメイトとともに勇者として異世界に召喚された。しかし、次々と周りがＳ級やＡ級の才覚を見出される中、〝廃棄対象〟となるＥ級の才能しかないと宣告されてしまう。救済を求める彼にクラスメイトが向けたのは蔑みの眼差しで……。そして、召喚主の女神ヴィシスにより生存者ゼロの遺跡に廃棄される。絶望に満ちた奈落の底で煮えたぎる復讐心を抱えた少年は、ハズレ枠と誹られた【状態異常スキル】で魔物を蹂躙する！

「何をしても生き残る――クソ女神に一発くれてやるまでは」
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.vi: Mimori Touka - Một học sinh cao trung với lối sống “quần chúng không khí”. Trong chuyến học dã ngoại của trường, Touka và các bạn cùng lớp bất ngờ bị Nữ Thần triệu hồi đến dị giới. Quá trình đánh giá năng lực theo hạng S, A, B, C, D đã được tiến hành và chuyện hiếm thấy là lần triệu hồi này quá nhiều người hùng cấp S tối thượng với cấp A ưu tú cùng quy tụ. Thêm vào đó, chỉ duy nhất Touka xếp hạng yếu kém - Người hùng cấp E có chỉ số trạng thái siêu thấp so với các bạn cùng lớp. Chưa kể kỹ năng cá nhân [Trạng Thái Dị Thường] của Touka còn vượt xa cái mốc thất bại toàn tập nơi dị giới khiến cậu bị “loại bỏ”. Trải qua bao thăng trầm đấu tranh giành giật sự sống, cậu quyết tâm trở thành ác quỷ để bắt đầu hành trình báo thù Nữ Thần.
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

Until his partner, Mikage Reo, discovers his talent in the "Blue Lock," a dormitory for training strikers that aims to win the World Cup for Japanese soccer.

Jusqu'à ce que son camarade de classe, Mikage Reo, découvre son talent pour le foot, cela les mènera jusqu'au « Blue Lock », un centre de formation révolutionnaire rassemblant les 300 meilleurs attaquants lycéens du pays.

description.en:
A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one.

"I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. 
Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.
description.es: Un niño que solía molestar a otras niñas un día se despierta como una. "Volveré pronto a ser un chico" el pensó, este no fue el caso. Sigue a Akira mientras crece y aprende poco a poco a aceptar los confusos cambios en sus alrededores y en su corazón.
description.fr: Un garçon qui avait l'habitude de malmener les filles se réveille un jour comme si il en était une. "Je redeviendrai bientôt un garçon", se dit-il, mais ce n'est pas le cas. Suivez Akira au fur et à mesure qu'il grandit et apprend peu à peu à accepter les changements déroutants de son environnement et de son cœur.
description.es-la: Kira es un chico que solía ser abusivo con las chicas, hasta que un día se despierta como una. "Volveré a ser un chico pronto", es lo que pensó, sin embargo, ese no seria el caso. Sigue a Akira mientras crece y aprende poco a poco a aceptar los cambios desconcertantes en su entorno y en su corazón
description.pt-br: Um menino que costumava ser abusivo com as meninas acorda um dia como uma garota. “Em breve voltarei a ser menino” ele pensou, mas não foi o caso. Siga Akira enquanto ele cresce e aprende pouco a pouco a aceitar as mudanças intrigantes ao seu redor e em seu coração.

title.en: "Issho ni Netaindesu yo Ne, Senpai?" to Amaku Sasayakarete Kon'ya mo Nemurenai

altTitles.ja: 「一緒に寝たいんですよね、せんぱい？」と甘くささやかれて今夜も眠れない

altTitles.en: "You Want to Sleep With Me, Don't You, Senpai?" and She Whispered Sweetly, So I Can't Sleep Tonight Either

altTitles.vi: Trị Chứng Mất Ngủ Bằng Asmr Cùng Nhỏ Đàn Em Tinh Nghịch~

description.en: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.
description.ja:
不眠症に悩む高校二年生・半崎獏也はある日、深夜の公園でカップ焼きそばをおいしそうに食べる後輩少女・小比類巻君鳥と出会う。獏也がぐっすり眠れるよう手伝いをすると言う彼女は、自分の家に来てほしいといきなり提案してきて！？
「女子の部屋に入って、いきなりクンクンと匂いを嗅ぐなんて流石先輩ですね」「……せーんぱい。おっぱい見過ぎです」と、隙あらば獏也をおちょくる君鳥ちゃんから耳元でエッチな言葉を囁かれたり添い寝したりと長い夜を過ごすことになり――！
description.vi: Bakuya a.k.a Lariat-senpai là một học sinh cao trung năm hai bị chứng mất ngủ. Một đêm, cậu gặp Kimidori, một cô gái năm nhất học cùng trường trong công viên. Cô tự nhận mình có thể chữa bệnh mất ngủ cho Bakuya, nhưng lại trêu chọc cậu mỗi khi có cơ hội.
description.es-la: Bakuya, un estudiante de segundo de bachillerato que padece insomnio, sin embargo, una noche conoce a Kimidori, una chica de tercero que le gusta comer fideos yakisoba de taza. Kimidori dice que puede ayudar a Bakuya a dormir, no obstante, le gusta gastarle bromas cada vez que ella tiene la oportunidad.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.en: Mid-Ut

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.ja: 僕の声を聞いてほしい!!

altTitles.en: Please Listen to My Voice!!

description.en:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
description.ja:
隣に住んでいた憧れのお姉さん・葉巧玟（イエチャオウェン）がこの町に戻ってきて、なし崩し的に高校生の僕・鄧賢和（ドンシアンホー）と同居することに。いつも颯爽としていてなんでもできる巧姉（チャオねえ）のはずが、僕の前では間抜けで優柔不断でダメダメな社会人だった!? さらに、バイト先で知りあったカッコいい先輩と、素直で明るい同級生。僕を囲む3人の女子はそれぞれが悩みを抱えていて……。楽しくもほろ苦い青春ドラマの幕が上がる!!

---
**Links:**
- [Official Japanese 1](https://comic.webnewtype.com/contents/bokukoe)
- [Official Japanese 2](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_KS12204287010000_68)
- [Official Japanese 3](https://web-ace.jp/comicnewtype/contents/693/)
- [Official Japanese 4](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64961)
description.vi: Chị hàng xóm hồi trước kiêm crush hồi bé của main, Diệp Kiều Văn, vừa mới chuyển lại về khu của main. Còn main của ta, Đặng Tiêu Hà, biết Kiều Văn là hoa có chủ rồi nên đành phải chôn giấu nỗi niềm trong tim. Tiêu Hà rất cay vì crush mình lúc đi làm thì rất chỉn chu và chuyên nghiệp nhưng về nhà thì chỉ biết nằm chảy thây ra. Thế nhưng, được crush đề nghị sống chung cùng thì sao mà từ chối được... Cùng với Ngọc Hàn, đàn chị uy tín ở chỗ làm part-time, và Ngọc Trinh (?), con bạn cùng lớp năng động, Tiêu Hà luôn được vây quanh bởi những cô gái với những vấn đề rất riêng của họ. Đây là khởi đầu cho một bộ truyện tình cảm vui vẻ và đầy sức sống cùng chút cảm xúc lắng đọng chấm điểm.
description.pt-br:
Ye Qiao Wen, uma velha companheira, vizinha de infância de nosso protagonista, a quem ele sempre admirou, mudou-se recentemente.

Mas Deng Xian He, o protagonista, descobriu recentemente que ela já tem outra pessoa em seu coração - um fato que o deixa muito magoado.

De repente, ao ver sua velha companheira, geralmente brilhante e capaz, se transformar em alguém sempre hesitante e confuso, Deng Xian He optou por reprimir seus sentimentos de amor, angústia e saudade que já duravam anos.
description.zh-hk: 從小憧憬的鄰居大姐姐葉巧玟最近搬回來了，但少年鄧賢和卻得知她心中另有所屬的消息，澆熄了鄧賢和多年來的思念。看見平常精明幹練的大姐姐，在自己面前卻變成迷糊、做事猶豫不決的迷茫社會人，少年隱忍着失戀的情緒，第一次想對她發出怒吼，卻還是同

altTitles.en: With You and the Rain

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.ja: ギャルとクトゥルフ

description.en: A trendy girl and aspiring idol thought she'd get a pet octopus to make it big as a pet idol, but she ended up getting Cthulhu! With the help of an elder god, aim for the top!

altTitles.ja: 僕の彼女はデッカワイイ
My Girl Friend Is Big & Cute!

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend Is Big & Cute!
My Girlfriend Is Giganticute
My Girlfriend Is Big and Cute!

altTitles.pl: Moja Dziewczyna Jest Wysoka i Urocza

altTitles.pt-br: Minha namorada é grande e fofa!

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn gái to lớn và dễ thương của tôi

altTitles.en: My Big Girlfriend is Cute

description.en:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!
description.pt-br:
Pelo que ele pode lembrar, Komi sempre foi mais baixo que seus colegas de classe. Ele sempre se sentiu inferior por causa disso, até que conheceu Obinata – uma garota que é muito mais alta que ele.

Sim, Asumi Obinata é alta. Ela é imponente. Mas ela também é a namorada de Komi Amane. E esses dois são as crianças mais felizes do mundo.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.en: Chieri's Love is 8 Meters Tall

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title.en: Josou Loli Jijii Dark Elf to Onnanoko ni Kirawareru Noroi o Motsu Ningen

altTitles.ja: 女装ロリジジィダークエルフと女の子に嫌われる呪いを持つ人間

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Loli Jijii Dark Elf to Onna no Ko ni Kirawareru Noroi wo Motsu Ningen

altTitles.en: An Old Man Dark Elf Crossdressing as a Loli and a Human Who Has a Curse That Makes Women Hate Him
A Crossdressing Dark Elf and a Human Who Has a Curse That Makes Women Hate Him
An Old Man Dark Elf Crossdresser Who Looks Like A Loli and a Human Who Has a Curse That Makes Women Hate Him

title.en: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.

altTitles.ja: 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro ha Wakaranai.

altTitles.en: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart.
I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like

altTitles.id: Sekarang saya dapat melihat masa depan dalam beberapa menit, tetapi saya tidak dapat memahami hati seorang wanita.

altTitles.pt-br: Agora, posso ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas ainda não consigo entender o coração de uma mulher.

description.en: Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn’t realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
description.id: Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.
description.ja:
伊藤新世は数分後の未来が分かる。ただし視える未来は不幸につながるもの。
お人好しな新世はそんな不都合な未来を回避し、様々な悩みを持つ少女を助けることになる。
新世は知らない。いつの間にか、少女たちに好かれていることに。
新世は気づかない。人知れず、少女たちが争っていることに。
description.pt-br: Arata Itou tem a habilidade de ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas as visões que ele tem estão sempre ligadas a infortúnios. Com seu coração bondoso, Arata decide usar esse poder inconveniente para ajudar as garotas que enfrentam diversos problemas e evitar seus futuros infelizes. No entanto, Arata não percebe que, pouco a pouco, as garotas começam a se afeiçoar a ele. E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção.

title.en: The Villainess and Miss Demon Lord

altTitles.ru: Злодейская дочь и мисс Королева демон

altTitles.vi: Thiên kim phản diện và tiểu thư ma vương

altTitles.en: The Daughter of Evil & Miss Devil

altTitles.ja: 魔法が使えない悪役令嬢に転生しました

description.en:
Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"

title.en: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

altTitles.en: Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game

altTitles.ja: 灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム

altTitles.ja-ro: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

description.en:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
description.ja:
大人気作品『灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム』のコミカライズ連載スタート！

高校デビューに失敗し、灰色の高校時代を経て大学４年となった青年・灰原夏希。社会人目前だった彼はある日突然、７年前――高校入学直前まで時を遡っていた!!
後悔しかなかった高校生活の「やり直し」の機会を得た夏希は、過去の経験を活かして見事クラスカースト最上位な美男美女６人グループの一員となることに成功！
しかもそこにはかつて片思いしていた美少女・陽花里の姿もあって……!?
無自覚ハイスペック青年が２度目の青春をリアルにやり直す、強くてニューゲーム学園ラブコメ！

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình lãng mạn và hài hước của Anh Hùng và Phù Thủy chuyển sinh
Chuyện tình chuyển sinh hài hước của Anh hùng và Phù thuỷ

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Comédia Romântica de Reencarnação entre um Herói e uma Feiticeira

description.en:
Choose the world or choose her. 

Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. 

However, that was a story of his past life. 

In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja:
世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。

平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。

とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。

今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi
description.pt-br: O estudante comum de ensino médio Shiraishi Godo guardava um "segredo", ele possuía memórias de uma vida passada. Em um mundo diferente deste, ele foi um "herói" que salvou a humanidade. Mas isso era uma história de sua vida passada. Nesta vida, Godo deveria ter uma vida escolar comum. Isso até a chegada da nova aluna Mai Shiina, que virou tudo de cabeça para baixo. Ela não era apenas uma aluna transferida. Mai era a reencarnação de Celis, a Feiticeira da Calamidade, sua mortal inimiga de vidas passadas. E ela estava lá, não por vingança, mas por algo mais — algo que mudaria o curso da vida de Godo mais uma vez. Agora, ele deve navegar pelas complexidades de suas memórias reencarnadas, sua crescente conexão com Mai e a escolha impossível entre uma vida pacífica e uma cheia de caos mágico.

title.en: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi de wa Irarenai

altTitles.en: Bear and Bunny Cannot Be Friends

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

altTitles.en: Playboy-kun & Neat-chan

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.ja: 星野ヒバナはみつがれる

altTitles.en: I Married My Female Friend

altTitles.ja: 女ともだちと結婚してみた。

altTitles.zh: 尝试与女性朋友结婚了

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘗試與女性朋友結婚了

altTitles.th: คุณเพื่อนคะลองมาแต่งงานกันมั้ย

description.en:
Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins.  
  
[Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
description.ja: 「5年後お互い独り身だったら結婚しよう」そんな友達との約束が実を結び、結婚することになったくるみと瑠璃子。恋人だったわけじゃない”ともだち”同士の二人の結婚生活は、何から何まで初めてづくし。
description.pt-br:
Duas mulheres que são apenas 
amigas fazem uma promessa... 
"Se nós duas ainda estivermos 
solteiras em 5 anos, vamos nos 
casar." Cinco anos depois, elas se 
reencontram, e as suas vidas 
de casadas começa.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan wa Oshimai! Koushiki Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい！ 公式アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ru: Мой братик теперь не братик! Официальная комикс-антология!

description.en:
An anthology comic of Onii-chan wa Oshimai! by various mangaka.

---

altTitles.en: Homeless
I Have No Home

altTitles.ja: 家がない！

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

title.en: Dou ka Ore wo Houtte Oitekure - Naze ka Bocchi no Owatta Koukou Seikatsu wo Kanojo ga Kaeyou to shite kuru

altTitles.ja: どうか俺を放っておいてくれ なぜかぼっちの終わった高校生活を彼女が変えようとしてくる

altTitles.en: Please Leave Me Alone: For Some Reason, She Wants to Change a Lone Wolf's Helpless High School Life

description.en:
Love, friendship, and the sparkling joys of youth. The high school life that I’ve looked forward to—still ended with me being alone. Then, just a day before the graduation ceremony...

*“Don’t die! Nanamura-kun!”*

Sora Hanamitsuji, she’s a beautiful girl that even models can’t compare to. My life ended after getting hit by a truck to protect her. That should’ve been the case.

However, with this accident, Hanamitsuji-san and I returned to the day of our high school’s entrance ceremony. The second high school life is no longer as charming and youthful. I was going to spend it modestly and alone. But, she said that won’t do.

*“Well, I’ll help you make friends.”*

This is a story about my second high school life. It’s the worst and best teenage rom-com ever.
description.ja: 恋、友情、輝かしい青春。そんな期待に胸を膨らませた俺の高校生活は――結局ぼっちのまま終わった。そして迎えた卒業式前日。クラスメイトの花見辻空をかばい、俺はトラックに轢かれて人生の幕を閉じた……はずだった。花見辻と一緒に高校一年生の入学式に戻ってしまった俺。二度目の高校生活は輝かしい青春など期待せず大人しくぼっちで過ごそうと思いきや……。「ぼっち脱却、私が手伝ってあげる」この物語は俺が二度目の高校生活で送る、最悪で最高の青春ラブコメだ。GA文庫の大人気作、待望のコミカライズ!

altTitles.en: Hanamaru Kindergarten

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

altTitles.en: Poor Little Sister

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

altTitles.en: TBATE

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.en: Don't Read This

description.en: There is no story to read here. (Interactive) This series contains themes regarding mental health and anxiety that may not be suitable for all readers. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, please reach out for help at [Crisis Text Line](http://crisistextline.org/).
description.ur:
یہ ایک ایسے شخص کے بارے میں ہے جو کہ ایک خالی خلہ میں پھنسا ہوا ہے اور وہ تمھاری موجودگی بالکل بھی نہیں چاہتا۔۔۔
اِسے نہ پڑھو

altTitles.ja: 鬼人幻燈抄

altTitles.en: Sword of the Demon Hunter: Kijin Gentosho

altTitles.pt-br: A Espada do Caçador de Demônios: Kijin Gentosho

description.en: In the Edo period, there was a shrine maiden called "Itsukihime" in the mountain village of Kadono. Jinta, a young man who acts as the shrine maiden's guardian despite being a stranger, encounters a mysterious demon who speaks of the far future in the forest where he went to defeat it. From Edo to the Heisei era, this huge Japanese fantasy series follows a demon man who travels through time while continuously questioning the meaning of wielding a sword.
description.ja: 江戸時代、山間の集落葛野には「いつきひめ」と呼ばれる巫女がいた。よそ者ながら巫女の護衛役を務める青年・甚太は、討伐に赴いた森で、遥か未来を語る不思議な鬼に出会う――江戸から平成へ。刀を振るう意味を問い続けながら途方もない時間を旅する鬼人の歩みは、重くて切ない。
description.pt-br: No período Edo, havia uma sacerdotisa chamada "Itsukihime" na aldeia montanhosa de Kadono. Jinta, um jovem que atua como guardião da sacerdotisa, apesar de ser um estranho, encontra um misterioso demônio que fala sobre o distante futuro na floresta onde foi para derrotá-lo. Do Edo à era Heisei, esta imensa série de fantasia japonesa acompanha um homem demônio que viaja no tempo enquanto questiona continuamente o significado de empunhar uma espada.

altTitles.en: The Lie Eater

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

title.en: Omae Imouto ja Nakute Iinazuke datta no kayo!?

altTitles.ja: お前妹じゃなくて許嫁だったのかよ!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Omae Imouto Janakute Iinazuke Datta no ka yo!?

altTitles.en: You Weren't My Sister, but My Fiancée?!

altTitles.ru: Ты была не моей сестрой, а моей невестой!?

altTitles.zh: 你原来不是我的妹妹而是我的未婚妻啊!?

altTitles.vi: Em Gái Tôi Là Hôn Thê Của Tôi!?

description.en:
"Humanity, adore thy little sister—." "I wonder when my sister Kana started becoming distant from me—."

Shina Takashi lamented his current days, where being ignored was not uncommon. One day, his parents dropped a shocking revelation. Not only was Takashi not their biological son... but he was also the fiancé of Kana, whom he thought was his sister! From siblings to potential romantic interests, it’s not easy to sort out feelings. The fluctuating emotions, the bewildering distance. Their relationship undergoes an inevitable change—! She's a sister but not a sister!
description.ja: いつ頃からだろう、妹の佳奈が自分に冷たくなったのは――。無視されることさえ少なくない現在の日々を、椎名隆は嘆いていた。そんなある日、両親から衝撃的な話を切り出される。なんと隆は実の息子ではなかった……だけではなく、妹だと思っていた佳奈の許嫁だった！兄妹から気になる異性へ、なんて簡単には気持ちの整理がつくはずもなく。揺れ動く感情、戸惑う距離感。二人の関係は否応なく変化して――!? 妹だけど妹じゃない！

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja: TOUGH 龍を継ぐ男

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

title.en: Moshimo, Yuurei ga Hatsukoi o Shitara.

altTitles.en: If a Ghost Fell in Love for the First Time

altTitles.id: Jika Hantu Jatuh Cinta untuk Pertama Kalinya

description.id:
Aku Souta. Tidak punya pengalaman cinta, disebut sebagai otaku introvert dan siswa SMA… atau lebih tepatnya, dulu.
Hah? Kamu tanya apakah aku sudah lulus dari status virgin dan menjadi anak yang lebih keren?
Bukan, bukan. Aku bukan lagi seorang siswa SMA――aku sudah menjadi hantu.
Dengan kata lain, aku berubah menjadi mantan manusia yang introvert, otaku, dan virgn.
Aku hampir tidak punya ingatan ketika aku masih hidup, hanya satu hal yang masih aku ingat— yaitu aku masih virgin.
Mungkin itu adalah penyesalanku.
Dan entah bagaimana, aku tidak bisa keluar dari sekolah khusus cewek ini, jadi semacam arwah gentayangan yang terikat di sma putri ini, dan itu sungguh menyebalkan.
Tapi, meski saat hidup aku terlalu takut untuk bicara dengan cewek, sebagai hantu aku bisa bebas melihat mereka dalam segala situasi!
Aku mungkin merasa sedikit bersalah, tapi jadi hantu ternyata tidak buruk juga! Begitulah pikirku.
Hingga suatu hari, aku melihat boneka karakter favoritku terjatuh di sekolah. Saat mencoba mengambilnya――
“Kenapa ada cowok… di sekolah cewek ini…?”
Cantik, baik hati, populer dengan semua orang, dan entah bagaimana satu-satunya orang yang bisa melihatku walaupun aku adalah hantu dan benar-benar peduli padaku――
Aku jatuh cinta pada seorang gadis yang sama sekali tidak selevel denganku.

altTitles.en: Nobunaga's Chef

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

altTitles.en: A Chef of Nobunaga

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.
